replies.body: Fake most likely a virus or just random bull shit. Snipers are expensive to make (i.e Chearful and Ninja do coding and coded lots of theirs but also paid some other coders) they wouldn't just give a legit working %100 sniper away with no fee.. and the fee would be like $600 or some crazy shit. Also a leaked forums link seems legit. Don't trust anyone selling snipers. Code your own (Which will NOT out do Chearful.ninja or Mcsniper).
